The lessons are broken down into neat, digestible stages (and tailored accordingly when I struggled in some areas) so I didn't feel I was bombarded with too much information. Thereâ€™s a really good mix of theory and practice, instructions are simple to follow, the exercises varied and importantly fun to do! I am now significantly more comfortable with my T break (including stopping in the wet and going down slopes) and am now eager to learn the power stop and improve my overall skating style.
